google._comment_clientSecret: In production, set GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET environment variable instead

auth._comment_sessionSecret: In production, set SESSION_SECRET environment variable instead. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

analytics._comment_script: scriptPath should be a URL to an external analytics script (e.g., Google Analytics, Plausible, etc.)

openobserve._comment_endpoint: OpenObserve base API URL (should end with /api/)
openobserve._comment_stream: The stream name to log events to
openobserve._comment_password: In production, set ANALYTICS_PASSWORD environment variable instead
openobserve._comment_serviceToken: Optional: Service token for OpenObserve API authentication (used for metrics queries). If not provided, username/password will be used.
openobserve._comment: OpenObserve endpoint and credentials for custom event tracking. The backend proxies requests to keep credentials secure. Set enabled to true to activate.

analytics._comment_hmacSecret: In production, set ANALYTICS_HMAC_SECRET environment variable instead
analytics._comment_hmac: HMAC secret for signing analytics events. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32. This prevents tampering with events.
